descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Enter the 12-word recovery phrase used to back up your Daedalus wallet to restore the balance and transfer all the funds from Daedalus to Icarus.
descriptors.description: Text for instructions step 0 on the Daedalus transfer form page.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!It will take about 1 minute to restore your balance. In the next step, you will be presented with a transaction that will move all of your funds from Daedalus to Icarus. Please review the details of the transaction carefully. You will need to pay a standard transaction fee on the Cardano network to make the transaction.
descriptors.description: Text for instructions step 1 on the Daedalus transfer form page.
Label for the recovery phrase input on the Daedalus transfer form page.
Hint "Enter recovery phrase" for the recovery phrase input on the Daedalus transfer form page.
"No results" message for the recovery phrase input search results.
Error message shown when invalid recovery phrase was entered.
Label for the back button on the Daedalus transfer form page.
Label for the next button on the Daedalus transfer form page.
Label "Instructions" on the Daedalus transfer instructions page.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Before you can transfer funds from your Daedalus wallet, you must create an Icarus wallet and back it up. Upon completion, you will receive a 15-word recovery phrase which can be used to restore your Icarus wallet at any time.
descriptors.description: Instructions text on the Daedalus transfer instructions page.
Label "Create Icarus wallet" on the Daedalus transfer instructions page.
Label "Attention" on the Daedalus transfer instructions page.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Icarus and Daedalus wallets use different key derivation scheme and they each have a separate format for addresses. For this reason, Daedalus wallets cannot be restored and continued to be used in Icarus and vice versa. This will change in the future. For now, to use funds from your Daedalus wallet, you need to transfer them to your Icarus wallet. Daedalus and Icarus wallets are fully compatible for transferring of funds. If you don’t have a working copy of Daedalus, you can use your 12-word recovery phrase used to restore and transfer the balance from Daedalus into Icarus.
descriptors.description: Attention text on the Daedalus transfer instructions page.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Do you have access to a working copy of your Daedalus wallet?
descriptors.description: Label "Do you have access to a working copy of your Daedalus wallet?" on the Daedalus transfer instructions page.
Label "Yes" on the Daedalus transfer instructions page.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Use the <receive screen> to generate a new address and use it to send funds from Daedalus.

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!On the following screen, you will see a set of 15 random words. This is
    your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered in any version of Daedalus application in order
    to back up or restore your wallet’s funds and private key.
descriptors.description: Instructions for backing up wallet recovery phrase on dialog that displays wallet recovery phrase.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Make sure nobody looks into your screen unless you want them to have access to your funds.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!A hardware wallet is a small USB device that adds an extra level of security to your wallet.
descriptors.description: Header text of about step on the Connect to Trezor Hardware Wallet dialog.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!It is more secure because your private key never leaves the hardware wallet.
descriptors.description: Header text of about step on the Connect to Trezor Hardware Wallet dialog.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Protects your funds when using a computer compromised with viruses, phishing attempts, malware and others.
descriptors.description: Header text of about step on the Connect to Trezor Hardware Wallet dialog.
